subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn, who entered Friday’s slalom with a 27-point edge, now trails Maria Riesch by 3 in the World Cup women’s overall standings heading into Saturday’s giant slalom.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn, who entered Friday’s slalom with a 27-point edge, now trails Maria Riesch by 3 in the World Cup women’s overall standings heading into Saturday’s giant slalom.
